pkgmetadata.longdescription: UK National River Flow Archive data from R // Utility functions to retrieve data from the UK National River Flow Archive. The package contains R wrappers to the UK NRFA data temporary-API (http://www.ceh.ac.uk/data/nrfa/). There are functions to retrieve stations falling in a bounding box, to generate a map and extracting time series and general information. It also contain the dataset \code{StationSummary}.
